query:
SELECT id as "id!: i32", 
account_id as "account_id!: String", 
link as "link!: String", 
unit_amount as "unit_amount!: i32", 
price_per_point as "price_per_point!: String", 
min_individual_reward as "min_individual_reward!: String", 
max_individual_reward as "max_individual_reward!: String", 
thumbs_up_only as "thumbs_up_only!: bool", 
status as "status!: CampaignRequestStatus", 
stripe_session_url as "stripe_session_url!: Option < String >", 
stripe_session_id as "stripe_session_id!: Option < String >", 
campaign_id as "campaign_id!: Option < i32 >", 
created_at as "created_at!: DateTime < Utc >" FROM campaign_requests WHERE (NOT $1::boolean OR id = $2::int4) AND (NOT $3::boolean OR id = ANY(CAST($4 as int4[])) ) AND (NOT $5::boolean OR account_id = $6::varchar) AND (NOT $7::boolean OR link = $8::varchar) AND (NOT $9::boolean OR unit_amount = $10::int4) AND (NOT $11::boolean OR unit_amount > $12::int4) AND (NOT $13::boolean OR unit_amount < $14::int4) AND (NOT $15::boolean OR price_per_point = $16::varchar) AND (NOT $17::boolean OR price_per_point > $18::varchar) AND (NOT $19::boolean OR price_per_point < $20::varchar) AND (NOT $21::boolean OR min_individual_reward = $22::varchar) AND (NOT $23::boolean OR min_individual_reward > $24::varchar) AND (NOT $25::boolean OR min_individual_reward < $26::varchar) AND (NOT $27::boolean OR max_individual_reward = $28::varchar) AND (NOT $29::boolean OR max_individual_reward > $30::varchar) AND (NOT $31::boolean OR max_individual_reward < $32::varchar) AND (NOT $33::boolean OR thumbs_up_only = $34::boolean) AND (NOT $35::boolean OR status = $36::campaign_request_status) AND (NOT $37::boolean OR stripe_session_url = $38::varchar) AND (NOT $39::boolean OR stripe_session_id = $40::varchar) AND (NOT $41::boolean OR campaign_id = $42::int4) AND (NOT $43::boolean OR created_at = $44::timestamptz) ORDER BY 
      (CASE ($45 = 'Id' AND NOT $46) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($45 = 'Id' AND $46) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($45 = 'AccountId' AND NOT $46) WHEN true THEN account_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($45 = 'AccountId' AND $46) WHEN true THEN account_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($45 = 'Link' AND NOT $46) WHEN true THEN link ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($45 = 'Link' AND $46) WHEN true THEN link ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($45 = 'UnitAmount' AND NOT $46) WHEN true THEN unit_amount ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($45 = 'UnitAmount' AND $46) WHEN true THEN unit_amount ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($45 = 'PricePerPoint' AND NOT $46) WHEN true THEN price_per_point ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($45 = 'PricePerPoint' AND $46) WHEN true THEN price_per_point ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($45 = 'MinIndividualReward' AND NOT $46) WHEN true THEN min_individual_reward ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($45 = 'MinIndividualReward' AND $46) WHEN true THEN min_individual_reward ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($45 = 'MaxIndividualReward' AND NOT $46) WHEN true THEN max_individual_reward ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($45 = 'MaxIndividualReward' AND $46) WHEN true THEN max_individual_reward ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($45 = 'ThumbsUpOnly' AND NOT $46) WHEN true THEN thumbs_up_only ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($45 = 'ThumbsUpOnly' AND $46) WHEN true THEN thumbs_up_only ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($45 = 'Status' AND NOT $46) WHEN true THEN status ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($45 = 'Status' AND $46) WHEN true THEN status ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($45 = 'StripeSessionUrl' AND NOT $46) WHEN true THEN stripe_session_url ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($45 = 'StripeSessionUrl' AND $46) WHEN true THEN stripe_session_url ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($45 = 'StripeSessionId' AND NOT $46) WHEN true THEN stripe_session_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($45 = 'StripeSessionId' AND $46) WHEN true THEN stripe_session_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($45 = 'CampaignId' AND NOT $46) WHEN true THEN campaign_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($45 = 'CampaignId' AND $46) WHEN true THEN campaign_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($45 = 'CreatedAt' AND NOT $46) WHEN true THEN created_at ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($45 = 'CreatedAt' AND $46) WHEN true THEN created_at ELSE NULL END) DESC
     LIMIT $47 OFFSET $48 FOR UPDATE
